text:
“We have watched more Bollywood weddings than Bollywood films this year” – that’s what a lot of cinema buffs on social media are saying.
After DeepVeer (Deepika Padukone and Ranveer Singh), NickYanka (Nick Jonas and Priyanka Chopra) tied the knot on Dec 1 and 2. Yesterday, the couple shared their wedding pictures and it caused a storm on social media. They were being shared live a wildfire on all the platforms.
What happens when something trends and gets extensively shared? It kick-starts a meme-fest, right?! That’s what happened yesterday.
They dreamed, followed their heart and created their own little fairytale at Jodhpur’s Umaid Bhawan – their wedding destination.
Don't Miss 623 SHARES 365 SHARES 7.5 K SHARES 893 SHARES
Priyanka Chopra looked gorgeous as she donned Ralph Lauren gown which had 75-foot veil; the newlyweds also had cut the 18-foot cake – which gave rise to memes and jokes on social media.
#1
priyanka chopra's veil is bigger and brighter than my future pic.twitter.com/7UhoGBz92T — b.🎄❄️ (@foutted) December 4, 2018
#2
I wonder if I can rent out Priyanka Chopra and Nick Jonas' wedding cake on AirBnB.
JK! As if I could afford a night's stay in that house. pic.twitter.com/ywHn58bWZP — Hanna "Noble Warrior Hero" Flint (@HannaFlint) December 4, 2018
#3
Priyanka Chopra's veil could serve as a mosquito net for my entire apartment with double insulation for the my windows. Wawu!! — VaMaphosa (@_katarinha_) December 4, 2018
#4
#5
I aspire to be as half as extra as Priyanka Chopra who had two weddings in one, a 75 foot veil at the Christian wedding, and an 18 foot tall cake made by chefs all over the world (including Dubai)... I’m fucking SHOOK — mehak🎄🎅🏽 (@vivalaziam) December 4, 2018
#6
After the tallest statue, an Indian wears the longest wedding dress. Jai ho! #PriyankaChopra pic.twitter.com/KUEe61hENR — Harsh Goenka (@hvgoenka) December 4, 2018
#7
i know you still got cake left @priyankachopra send me some sis — furniturewala (@kalindivdw) December 4, 2018
#8
I aspire to be as extra as @priyankachopra’s 75 ft veil pic.twitter.com/uDsFe93s8n — Vandita (@vforvandita) December 4, 2018
#9
I get it — Nick Jonas + Priyanka Chopra got married. (I’ve seen the hundreds of photos.) But I honestly just want to see photos of their wedding cake.
Really, where they at? — Amina Ahmad (@aminaahmad) December 4, 2018
#10
Thank you @priyankachopra for letting us know that you can use mosquito net a.k.a machardani has a veil. pic.twitter.com/EfNWhgZmdQ — saikiran (@imsai_sk) December 4, 2018
title: 75-Foot Veil & 18-Foot Cake! Priyanka-Nick’s Wedding Pictures Cause A Meme Storm On Internet
description: Priyanka Chopra and Nick Jonas dreamed, followed their heart and created their own little fairytale at Jodhpur’s Umaid Bhawan – their wedding destination. Priyanka Chopra looked gorgeous as she donned Ralph Lauren gown which had 75-foot veil; the newlyweds also had cut 18 foot cake – which gave rise to memes and jokes on social media.
